Apne liye nahi, apno ke liye jiyo.
Mithaas baaton mein nahi, vyavhaar mein honi chahiye.
Seva dharam sabse bada dharam hai.
Jo jhukta hai wo toota nahi.
Prabhu ki sharan mein raho, sab chinta door ho jayegi.
Zindagi ek khel hai, ise jeetna aapke haath mein hai.
Duniya ki parwah mat karo, apne lakshya par dhyan do.
Ram naam satya hai.
Jo dusron ka bhala sochta hai, uska kabhi bura nahi hota.
Maa-Baap ka aashirwad sabse bada kavach hai.
Radha rani ki jai.
Samay bahumulya hai, ise vyarth mat karo.
Achhe vichar hi achhe jeevan ki neev hain.
Jeevan mein kathinaiyan aati hain taaki hum majboot ban sakein.
Vishwas rakho, andhere ke baad ujala zaroor aata hai.
Har ek pal ko khushi se jiyo.
Bhagwan ke ghar der hai, andher nahi.
Sachhai ki jeet hamesha hoti hai.
Radhe Krishna ki jodi amar hai.
Prem hi jeevan ka saar hai.
Jo mehnat karta hai, wo kabhi bhookha nahi sota.
Dhairya hi sabse badi shakti hai.
Shanti man ke bhitar hai.
Dusron ki khushi mein apni khushi dhundo.
Gyan wo deepak hai jo andhere ko door karta hai.
Sanskar hi insaan ko mahan banate hain.
Mata-Pita ki seva se badhkar koi pun-ya nahi.
Prabhu ka sumiran karo, beda paar hoga.
Jai Bhole Bhandari.
Shiv ji ki kripa jis par ho, uska koi baal bhi banka nahi kar sakta.
Apne karmon par dhyan do, fal ki chinta mat karo.
Satya, Ahimsa aur Prem.
Jeevan mein santosh sabse bada dhan hai.
Jo dusron ko maaf karta hai, Bhagwan use maaf karte hain.
Duniya gol hai, jo doge wahi wapas milega.
Achhai kabhi vyarth nahi jati.
Bhagwan sabke hain.
Radhe Radhe bolo.
Krishna kaho ya Ram, sab ek hi hain.
Man changa to kathoti mein Ganga.
Seva hi parmo dharma.
Jo dar gaya, samjho mar gaya.
Himmat e marda, madade khuda.
Koshish karne walon ki kabhi haar nahi hoti.
Asafalta ek chunauti hai, ise sweekar karo.
Jab tak safal na ho, neend chain ko tyago tum.
Kuch kiye bina hi jai jai kaar nahi hoti.
Lehron se darkar nauka paar nahi hoti.
Nanhi cheeti jab daana lekar chalti hai, chadhti deewaron par sau baar fisalti hai.
Man ka vishwas ragon mein sahas bharta hai.
Girkar chadhna, chadhkar girna na akharta hai.
Aakhir uski mehnat bekar nahi hoti.
Duvidha mein dono gaye, maya mili na Ram.
Kaal kare so aaj kar, aaj kare so ab.
Bura jo dekhan main chala, bura na milya koy.
Aisi vani boliye, man ka aapa khoy.
Dukh mein sumiran sab kare, sukh mein kare na koy.
Jo sukh mein sumiran kare, to dukh kaahe ko hoy.
Mati kahe kumhar se, tu kya roned mohe.
Ek din aisa aayega, main rounungi tohe.
Bada hua to kya hua, jaise ped khajoor.
Panthi ko chaya nahi, fal laage ati door.
Pothi padh padh jag mua, pandit bhaya na koy.
Dhai aakhar prem ka, padhe so pandit hoy.
Saanch barabar tap nahi, jhooth barabar paap.
Jake hriday saanch hai, take hriday aap.
Vraksh kabahu nahi fal bhakhe, nadi na sanche neer.
Parmarth ke karane, sadhun dhara shareer.
Rahiman dhaga prem ka, mat todo chatkay.
Toote se phir na jude, jude gaanth pad jaye.
Rahiman pani rakhiye, bin pani sab soon.
Pani gaye na ubre, moti manas choon.
Kart kart abhyas ke, jadmati hot sujaan.
Rasri aawat jaat te, sil par padat nishan.
Vidya dadati vinayam.
Janani janmabhoomischa swargadapi gariyasi.
Satyamev Jayate.
Ahinsa Parmo Dharma.
Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam.
Yoga karmasu kaushalam.
Dharmo rakshati rakshitah.
Sarve bhavantu sukhinah.
Tamso ma jyotirgamaya.
Om Namah Shivaya.
Jai Shree Ganesh.
Om Shanti.
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna Hare Hare.
Hare Rama Hare Rama, Rama Rama Hare Hare.
Radhe Govind.
Jai Mata Di.
Om Sai Ram.
Waheguru Ji Ka Khalsa, Waheguru Ji Ki Fateh.
Jai Jinendra.
Buddham Sharanam Gacchami.
Sabka bhala karo Bhagwan.
Sarbat da bhala.
Jaisi drishti waisi srishti.
Apna time aayega.
Ruk jana nahi tu kahin haar ke.
Jeet jayenge hum.
Lakshya to har haal mein paana hai.
Kar har maidan fateh.
Zindagi na milegi dobara.
Kal ho na ho.
All is well.
Darr ke aage jeet hai.
Impossible is nothing.
Just do it.
Believe in yourself.
Never give up.
Dream big.
Stay positive.
Be happy.
Love yourself.
Respect everyone.
Help others.
Be kind.
Spread love.
Smile often.
Live simply.
Think high.
Work hard.
Stay humble.
Trust God.
